brainly_data.question:
During editing and proofreading, you do not need to _____. 
A. check facts 
B. revise overall structure 
C. scrutinize spelling 
D. follow grammar, usage, and mechanics
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
During editing and proofreading, you do not need to _____. 
A. check facts 
B. revise overall structure 
C. scrutinize spelling 
D. follow grammar, usage, and mechanics
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: Answer is B. Revise overall structure.
